headline.print_headline: Egypt's Top TV Satirist Returns, Criticizes Public for Lionizing Sisi
headline.main: Egypt's Top TV Satirist Returns, Criticizes Public for Lionizing Sisi

docs.snippet: Egypt's top satirist returned to television on Friday for the first airing of his show since it was pulled three months ago, and he skewered the public and media for lionizing the army chief widely expected to be the country's next president....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's top satirist returned to television on Friday for the first airing of his show since it was pulled three months ago, and he skewered the public and media for lionizing the army chief widely expected to be the country's next president.

headline.print_headline: Ice Hockey: Miller Eager for Shot at Redemption in Sochi
headline.main: Ice Hockey: Miller Eager for Shot at Redemption in Sochi

docs.snippet: Ryan Miller was the face of U.S. ice hockey during a magical run at the 2010 Vancouver Games but the goaltender had to rediscover his form to earn a spot on the Sochi Olympics squad....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Miller was the face of U.S. ice hockey during a magical run at the 2010 Vancouver Games but the goaltender had to rediscover his form to earn a spot on the Sochi Olympics squad.

headline.print_headline: Fox Cancels 'X Factor' as Simon Cowell Returns to UK Version
headline.main: Fox Cancels 'X Factor' as Simon Cowell Returns to UK Version

docs.snippet: U.S. television singing contest "The X Factor," led by judge and show creator Simon Cowell, was canceled on Friday after three seasons, network Fox said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. television singing contest "The X Factor," led by judge and show creator Simon Cowell, was canceled on Friday after three seasons, network Fox said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Will U.S. Stock Buyers Beat Back the Bear?
headline.main: Will U.S. Stock Buyers Beat Back the Bear?

docs.snippet: After the S&P 500's first weekly gain in a month, investors will see next week whether the U.S. stock market's rally of the last two days is the shape of better things to come - or if this year's weakness will turn into a full-fledged correcti...
docs.lead_paragraph: After the S&P 500's first weekly gain in a month, investors will see next week whether the U.S. stock market's rally of the last two days is the shape of better things to come - or if this year's weakness will turn into a full-fledged correction.

headline.sub: Russian Winter Olympics kick off with minor glitch
headline.main: Russian Winter Olympics kick off with minor glitch

docs.snippet: The 2014 Russian Winter Olympic Games kick off with an opening ceremony one fan calls, "one of the greatest," even though one of the Olympic rings didn't light up. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 2014 Russian Winter Olympic Games kick off with an opening ceremony one fan calls, "one of the greatest," even though one of the Olympic rings didn't light up. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.print_headline: Minn. Boy Stowaway Close to Reunion With Parents
headline.main: Minn. Boy Stowaway Close to Reunion With Parents

docs.snippet: A Minnesota boy who stowed away on a flight to Las Vegas last year is close to being reunited with his parents, a judge said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Minnesota boy who stowed away on a flight to Las Vegas last year is close to being reunited with his parents, a judge said Friday.
